answers.answer: i did im 32 weeks and baby is healthy and i dont have gestational diabetes or preeclampsia

During my whole pregnancy I craved a lot of fruits and salty stuff. Now that I'm a week away from delivering (39+1) I been craving sweets and chocolate like crazyy. I can't go a day without eating a chocolate bar. I have my husband going nuts about it.

Don't eat too much, just limit yourself everyday. Too much sugar might effect your baby by them having sugar craving headaches when they r born. Cause they are used to all that sugar while in the womb and then they don't get it after they are born.Idk why I said that all complicated but they can get sugar withdrawals after birth.

question: is it bad to eat candy , i think i been eatin it like everyday but i crave it so much. I was never the kind of person to like candy n now i cant get enough.
title: Chocolate craving
